communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Kick off with blunt accusations or rhetorical questions; vary openings.

narratives.c_essay: In three months, I'm outta here for college, leaving behind my dad's mechanic shop vibes and my Walmart stocker gig. Being vegan in this meat-loving world adds to my daily grind. Muse's tunes are my escape from this mess.
narratives.p_intro: I'm incel_0011_db45bb, the guy who's done with dating failures and sick of this rigged social hierarchy. Women and society, you're on notice - my rage isn't just online.
